relation: Blue posts around campus, a night shuttle from the parking lots. Write parking tickets for the stupidest things....
Whatever you did in high school. Go visit friends at real colleges.
Most of the classes are comparable to other college courses and require a good bit of work.

Bucks provides a low cost college option for those looking to continue their education. However, it should not be anyone graduating from high school's first choice as you will wish you went somewhere else. A good choice for older people coming back to school, however I would not recommend it to college freshman or sophomores.

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Campus Safety Students get ID the first day they start at Bucks. The school also has security guards all over, and teacher to make sure your are in the right class. Greek Life Students will study the historical stages of the Hellenic-Greek World. The class teaches the development of the Bronze Age, Archaic, Classical, and Hellenistic societies of Ancient Greece. Clubs and Activities Theirs many clubs and activitys like Arts & Media, Faith Focused, Student Leadership/ Programming, Inactive Clubs (Students/ Advisors ), and so much more. Great for these types of students If you love diversity and meeting new people, and great sport bucks is the place for you. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus I'm a freshman at buck and i play volleyball and found out are mascot is a centurion. What is it you ask a knight looking thing. Bang for the buck bucks is the best school I've ever been to. With great people , and teacher who care. Come on done and give us a try. What to do for
